# 项目初始化

# eslint

检测js代码

pnpm add eslint -D
# 生成.eslint.cjs文件
npx eslint --init 

  To check syntax only
  To check syntax and find problems # 选这个
  To check syntax, find problems, and enforce code style

module.exports = {
    // 运行环境
    "env": {
        "browser": true,
        "es2021": true
    },
    // 继承规则
    "extends": [
        "eslint:recommended",
        "plugin:vue/vue3-essential",
        "plugin:@typescript-eslint/recommended"
    ],
    // 为特定类型文件制定处理器
    "overrides": [
    ],
    // 指定解析器
    "parser": "@typescript-eslint/parser",
    // 解析器选项
    "parserOptions": {
        "ecmaVersion": "latest",
        "sourceType": "module"
    },
    // 插件  检测vue和ts
    "plugins": [
        "vue",
        "@typescript-eslint"
    ],
    // 规则配置
    "rules": {
        "no-var": "error",
        "no-multiple-empty-lines": ['warn', { max: 1 }],
        "no-console": process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production' ? 'error' : 'off',
        "no-debugger": process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production' ? 'error' : 'off',
        "no-unexpected-multiline": 'error',
        "no-useless-escape": 'off',
        "@typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars": 'error',
        "@typescript-eslint/prefer-ts-expect-error": 'error',
        // "@typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any":'off',
        "@typescript-eslint/no-non-null-assertion": 'off',
        "@typescript-eslint/no-namespace": "off",
        "@typescript-eslint/semi": 'off',

        "vue/muti-word-component-names": 'off',// 组件名 - 连接
        'vue/script-setup-uses-vars': 'error',
        'vue/no-mutating-props': 'off',// 不允许组件prop的改变
        'vue/attribute-hyphenation': 'off'
    }
}

配置eslint的忽略文件

dist 
node_modules

脚本配置

  "scripts": {
    "lint": "eslint src",
    "fix":"eslint src --fix",
  },

# prettier

格式化代码

pnpm install -D eslint-plugin-prettier prettier eslint-config-prettier

添加.prettierrc.json配置文件

{
    "singleQuote":true,// 字符串单引号
    "semi":false,// 不需要分号
    "bracketSpacing":true,
    "htmlWhitespacesSensitivity":"ignore",
    "endOfLine":"auto",
    "trailingComma":"all",
    "tabWidth":2 // 缩进
}

配置prettier忽略文件

/dist/*
/html/*
.local
/node_modules/** 
**/*.svg
**/*.sh
/public/*

# stylelint

css格式规范和校验

pnpm install -D sass-loader sass stylelint postcss postcss-scss postcss-html stylelint-config-prettier stylelint-config-recess-order stylelint-config-recommended-scss stylelint-config-standard stylelint-config-standard-vue stylelint-scss stylelint-order stylelint-config-standard-scss

配置

module.exports = {
    extends: [
        'stylelint-config-standard',
        'stylelint-config-html/vue',// template样式格式化
        'stylelint-config-standard-scss',//scss插件
        'stylelint-config-recommend-vue/scss',// vue中scss格式化
        'stylelint-config-recess-order',
        'stylelint-config-prettier'
    ],
    overrides: [
        {
            files: ['**/*.(scss|css|vue|html)'],
            customSyntax: 'postcss-scss'
        },
        {
            files: ['**/*.(html|vue)'],
            customSyntax: 'postcss-html'
        }
    ],
    ignoreFiles: [
        '**/*.js',
        '**/*.jsx',
        '**/*.ts',
        '**/*.tsx',
        '**/*.json',
        '**/*.yaml',
        '**/*.md',
    ],
    rules: {
        'value-keyword-case': null,
        'no-descending-specificity': null,
        'function-url-quotes': 'always',
        'no-empty-source': null,
        'selector-class-pattern': null,
        'property-no-unknow': null,
        'block-opening-brace-sapce-before': 'always',
        'value-no-vendor-prefix': null,
        'selector-pseudo-class-no-unknow': [
            true,
            {
                ignorePseudoClasses: ['global', 'v-deep', 'deeps']
            }
        ]
    }
}

脚本配置

  "scripts": {
    "format":"prettier --write \"./**/*/{html,vue,ts,js.json,md}\"",
    "lint:eslint":"eslint src/**/*.{ts,vue} --cache --fix",
    "lint:style":"stylelint src/**/*.{css,scss,vue} --cache --fix"
  },

# husky配置

pnpm install -D husky

npx husky-init   
# Activate hooks
npx husky install
# 添加钩子
npx husky add .husky/commit-msg

然后可以在生成的文件中去配置运行命令

#!/usr/bin/env sh
. "$(dirname -- "$0")/_/husky.sh"

pnpm run format
pnpm run commitlint

# commitlint

git commit 规范

pnpm install  -D  @commitlint/config-conventional @commitlint/cli

配置

module.exports = {
    extends: ['@commitlint/config-conventional'],
    rules: {
        'type-enum': [
            2,
            'always',
            [
                'feat',
                'fix',
                'docs',
                'style',
                'refactor',
                'perf',
                'test',
                'chore',
                'revert',
                'build'
            ]
        ],
        'type-case': [0],
        'type-empty': [0],
        'scope-empty': [0],
        'scope-case': [0],
        'subject-full-stop': [0, 'never'],
        'subject-case': [0, 'never'],
        'header-max-length': [0, 'always', 72],

    }
}

  "scripts": {
    "commitlint":"commitlint --config commitlint.config.cjs -e -V"
  },

# 统一包管理工具

写一个判断脚本

if (!/pnpm/.test(process.env.npm_execpath || '')) {
    console.warn('you must use pnpm as the package manager')
    process.exit(1)
}

在package.json中配置install钩子执行该脚本

"sciprt":{
     "preinstall": "node preinstall.js"
}
